document_info.title: Manual Crystallization and Salting Techniques
document_info.purpose: Guide to crystallization and salt conversion procedures
document_info.disclaimer: Educational reference only. Documents historical extraction chemistry research.

manual_crystallization.description: Procedure to convert oily freebase to solid chunks

applicability.alternative_use: With freebase spice moistened with water for recrystallization

step_1.action: Use razor blade to spread oily product thinly and firmly across dish

step_2.action: When oil thickens to pasty consistency, use lab spatula to repeatedly scrape up and spread out
step_2.goal: Product thickens noticeably more with each cycle

step_3.wait: Allow to harden to clay-like consistency

step_4.action: Scrape up and mold to desired form and density

manual_crystallization.result: Freebase chunks - solid form easier to handle and dose

salting.definition: Process by which freebase DMT is reacted with acid to create water-soluble salt form
salting.natural_occurrence: DMT in botanical sources tends to be in salt-form naturally
salting.purpose: Facilitates simple aqueous extraction for brews and A/B extraction
common_applications: Aqueous acid extractions from plant material

crystallization_challenge.problem: Salt-form rarely lends itself to proper crystallization
crystallization_challenge.solution: Very specific methods and materials required for crystalline salt

dmt_acetate.notes: Can use dilute vinegar or glacial acetic acid

dmt_fumarate.form: Can crystallize more readily than acetate
advantages: Known conversion ratio (76% DMT by weight)

fasw.name: Fumaric Acid Saturated Water
fasw.description: Saturated solution of fumaric acid in water
process: Mix with nonpolar solvent containing freebase
Shake/mix to transfer DMT to water layer as fumarate
Evaporate water to obtain DMT fumarate

vinegar_salting.preference: Glacial acetic acid produces cleaner product

methods.name: Sodium carbonate paste
methods.process: Mix fumarate with sodium carbonate and minimal water

methods.name: Ammonia wash
methods.process: Wash fumarate with dilute ammonia solution

methods.name: Slow crystallization
methods.process: Dissolve fumarate in water, add sodium carbonate solution, refrigerate for days

methods.name: Heat dissociation
methods.process: Gentle heat causes acetic acid to evaporate, leaving freebase

methods.name: Base conversion
methods.process: Add base to neutralize acid and convert to freebase

oily_product.cause: Common with salt forms and impure freebase

hygroscopic_product.cause: Some salts absorb moisture from air
hygroscopic_product.solution: Store in airtight container with desiccant

impurities.cause: Plant fats, other alkaloids, solvent residue

general.container: Glass preferred, avoid plastic for long-term
